column4: Anybody just listen, please, If Ubuntu means humanity then why the problem with external monitor and nvidia cards is not fixed in releases? it just need to add some lines to xorg and block some modules
I can use it when I'm just installing ubuntu
right now I'm using it but I fixed all settings
some things cannot be fixed as easy as it appears to be, especially not when it is about closed drivers, but don't ask me about it...
